text: and II was a little boy who was only
four years old one day and II was hungry
and decided to leave his home and go to
the market he got lost though and began
to cry Amy saw Andi standing by the
7-eleven and recognized him
she asked him what was the problem and
he began to cry even more and could not
remember his dad's cellphone number to
tell Amy Amy wanted to go to a club
meeting at her school but she knew that
she needed to help Andi The Book of
Proverbs in the Bible tells us to speak
up for people who cannot speak for
themselves help people who are in
trouble Amy bought Andi an ice-cream
cone and then walked with him back to
his home
Andi was so happy that he gave a me a
big hug and thanked her many times
you
